\section*{\begin{picture}(20,0) \put(-5,-10){\includegraphics*[width=1cm]{/www/erowid.org/experiences/images/erologo_1cm_600dpi_greyscale}} \end{picture} Erowid Experience Vaults Report Id: 89703}

\subsection*{Hospital Dunce}
\vspace{-0.2cm}
by \emph{John}
\vspace{0.5cm}
\thispagestyle{plain}

\setlength{\parskip}{1ex}
\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|c|c|c|}
\hline
Dose:  T+ 0:00 & 12.5 ml &  & Pharms - Risperidone & liquid\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{1mm}

\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|}
\hline
Body weight: & 175.00 lbs\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{2mm}
Ok basicly I went to the psych ward for fighting with my roomate because he gave me 42 mg of ritalin and it fired my brain so I took him outside and I fought him took it to far and realized I had just hurt my best friend\ldots  retarded I know\ldots  



Anyways he framed me into getting into a psych ward with the cops by telling them I wanted to kill myself\ldots  While tdo'ed [temporary detaining order] in the psych ward they prescribed me risparadal but I wouldnt take it and after a while they just gave me a big ass long acting shot of 12.5 ml\ldots . The shot lasted for about 10-11 weeks and put me in hell everyday\ldots I would compare it to frying my brain for 2-3 months straight\ldots  at the end of it all I was on planet just to come to being a vegetable,\ldots . Now I have scabies, a fried brain, and staph infections from the ward\ldots .hate the mental health system wished I had never even been alive! HELL on EARTH not to say I didnt deserve it.

\end{document}
